document.full_text: libyan foreign minister moussa koussa, one of muammar gaddafi's closest advisers and a former spy chief, defected and flew to britain on wednesday in protest at attacks by gaddafi forces on civilians, a friend said.
document.title: libya's foreign minister defects, arrives in britain
lines_and_colors: libyan foreign minister moussa koussa, one of muammar gaddafi's closest advisers and a former spy chief, defected and flew to britain on wednesday in protest at attacks by gaddafi forces on civilians, a friend said.
